package:
schunk_pgn64_support 0.1.0
ROS-Industrial Support Package for the Schunk PGN-plus 64-1 Gripper
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for parallel grippers designed to be appended to the MH5 robot.
Compatible Robots
MH5 - Default Config
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
